CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Recurring task lists and top task publishing requests
CurrentVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Recurring task lists and top task publishing requests
OldVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom enabled meetings from Teams
CurrentVersion.description: If the any organizer creates a Zoom/Google meet/ any third-party meeting application from Outlook or OWA, meeting participants will be able to join that meeting from inside Teams calendar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom enabled meetings from Teams
OldVersion.description:
If the any organizer creates a Zoom/Google meet/
any third-party meeting application from Outlook or OWA, meeting participants
will be able to join that meeting from inside Teams calendar.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
OldVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Standardization of Viva Learning Webapp Links
CurrentVersion.description: Webapp links will have user-friendly and easily addressable links to pages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Standardization of Viva Learning Webapp Links
OldVersion.description: Webapp links will have user-friendly and easily addressable links to pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
OldVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: ,Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
OldVersion.description: ,Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels to protect Microsoft Teams shared channels
CurrentVersion.description: Sensitivity labels will protect Microsoft Teams shared controls with sharing and discovery controls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels to protect Microsoft Teams shared channels
OldVersion.description: Sensitivity labels will protect Microsoft Teams shared controls with sharing and discovery controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
OldVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Working hours and location
CurrentVersion.description: ,New working hours and location options in Outlook lets people set more flexible working hours each day and specify the location from where they plan to work. You can also view your colleagues' work location when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Request License for Others
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables all unlicensed users to request a license from their IT Admin. IT Admins see these requests in MAC and either approve or decline them. Today, unlicensed users who get errors while trying to sign in cannot proceed. With this feature, they can at least express intent to their IT Admin to start using Goals. Also, Org Admins can now request licenses for all unlicensed users in their Goals Organizations, thus unblocking them from using Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New users can auto-claim licenses
CurrentVersion.description: By creating the Auto-claim policy for any product, IT Admins will enable eligible new users to claim a license to the product when they sign in. This removes the dependency on the IT Admin and provides a seamless experience to end users. Viva Goals will be onboarded to this platform.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: "Help me create" in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: ,"Help me create" is a content create feature in Microsoft365.com that is powered by Copilot for Microsoft 365. Like Copilot, "Help me create" is built on Microsoft's comprehensive approach to security, compliance, and privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Leader suggestions in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage Admins and corporate communicators will now see up to three leader suggestions so that they are added to leadership corner. These suggestions are primarily powered by AAD organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
CurrentVersion.description: Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Device Portfolio - Surface Hub
CurrentVersion.description: Support Surface Hub devices for monitoring, incident management, app management (Connect, Teams), inventory management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Device Portfolio - Surface Hub
OldVersion.description: Support Surface Hub devices for monitoring, incident management, app management (Connect, Teams), inventory management.
